website_summaries.verdict: Comprehensive sound, durable design, and easy portability for a reasonable price.
pros: Solar-powered speaker is waterproof, dustproof, and drop-proof
Bluetooth works from a long distance, and design makes it easy to carry and transport
Charged battery lasts up to 50 hours
cons: Does not pair with other speakers

customer_reviews.title: Solar soundbar - My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for the best energy efficient devices and this is just amazing. I'm so pleasantly surprised. It meets all of the needs I had and more. I was looking for one that would be good enough for my small kitchen but once I heard it playing I was stunned at how full and well balanced it sounded! I've been using it since I got it in the mail and I can't be tired of it. Very easy to pair. I'm charging my phone on it and the battery life is spectacular, so you don't really have to worry about charging it often. Overall, great speaker! I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: ECrone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Solar Bluetooth Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Solar Bluetooth speaker. It was super easy to set up the Bluetooth to all my devices such as my Iphone, movie projector, Itouch and microphone. It sounds crystal clear and it is very lightweight making it so very easy to transport with you where ever you go. The Solar panels within the speaker make it so convenient to make sure that it is always charged. I really love the feature that is has in the speaker for you answer the phone if you are using your phone to play music. It was well worth the money I spent for it, actually it was very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great Little  Speaker That Packs A Punch!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this speaker! It was super simple to pair with my phone. The sound quality is superb both indoors and outdoors! Clean and crisp with no static, even when using at max volume. My main reason for purchasing this particular speaker was for the solar panel so that I could use while in the pool, and I'm not disappointed! No more worrying about battery life while trying to swim. And it's waterproof!! This is also gonna be super handy on our annual beach vacation. It's the perfect size for a portable speaker. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LisaRamos113

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge!!
customer_reviews.text: Left it charging overnight several times. Does not charge, not even in the sun. Asking for a refund - will try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I got this and compared it to my old Bluetooth speaker. The sound quality is different. It’s better than my old one because you can clearly hear the sound even if it’s loud. And the max volume is louder than my old speaker even when you’re outside. Easy to use and very handy wherever you go when you want to here your favorite music. For what it cost is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker! It has exceptional sound quality. It’s not overly big so it’s perfect to take around the house from room to room without taking up tons of space. The added bonus for me is the solar panel. Spending a lot of time outside in the summer by the pool , I am excited to have a speaker that won’t loose its charge! I have used a couple other Bluetooth speakers and they loose charge quickly and they just don’t have the sound quality that this speaker has! Over all I am extremely pleased with this purchase and would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Little Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was awesome. It was easy to set up right out of the box. It paired in an instant. It charged quickly using the solar powered function. I have not had to plug it in yet! I used this all weekend at the lake. Through splashes on the dock, a boat ride and tons of use, this speaker was a strong choice! I did not have any issues with the speaker. The sound quality was awesome. This is a great traveling speaker as it does not take up a lot of space and it can charge on the go! I would definitely recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: KC Morgans

customer_reviews.title: Don't know where this thing came from or who makes it
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for a section hike I took up in the eastern Sierras last September. It worked and sounded great! Sometime in May it stopped holding a charge. It's a good little unit and I just wanted it replaced under warranty. I tried to find Gadget City on the web and it directed me to an outfit in Australia which wasn't the right one. So I contacted Amazon and they simply replaced my unit as this was warrantied for 18 months and after being on the phone with the customer service tech for an hour, who was very helpful, she couldn't locate who made or sold this item either. Thank goodness for Amazon customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Solar panel popped off
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the talk otherwise it’s just like all the other ones it looks like. You’re getting what you pay for, a cheap speaker that’s fine for quiet places but too quiet if you use where any kind of background noise is happening. I used it in a work truck and could make out music like 70% of time but trying to listen to podcasts or books where you need to understand everything said was asking too much. And like the title said the solar panel popped while sitting in a hot car. Not planning on rebuying
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! Sound quality is superb! It can keep up with deep beats, mids and highs without freaking out or giving feedback like some other speakers of this size. It has a well-balanced sound altogether. Lasts for hours on a full charge, even while charging a phone. The multifunctionality alone is worth the buy! If you don’t want to use the bluetooth feature, you have lots of options including a memory card slot and aux port. And what’s cooler than a solar charger? On the go and run out of juice? Just put the speaker in the sun and away you go! All around great speaker. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Little Speaker That Packs A Serious Punch!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazingly surprised at the great value of this product. Waterproof, hands-free mic, solar-powered, power bank, and SD slot up to 128GB to name a few. I just wished they make a bigger speaker for my '55 in 4K Tv. I highly recommend to anyone who loves the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: E.M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a BBQ party the other day the guests wouldn’t stop raving about the overall sound. The fact that it’s solar powered is awesome and connected to the phone easily. Long battery life will definitely be taken to the beach with us often. It comes with a charging cable and for those who don’t have Bluetooth an aux cable is also included. We compared it to the Alexa we have on the porch and the bass was much better. When the volume increases the quality is not affected. Customer service is fabulous as well you can tell they care about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Bad to say :)
customer_reviews.text: Okay I really like this speaker. It’s really good quality for such a good price. I feel like I basically saved $50-$70 dollars by not getting something “name brand”. I’ve been using it a lot outdoors lately and the solar panel has definitely been a life saver. I’m not worried as much about not having an outlet when I’m using it outside for a long time so I’m definitely really liking that. I’ve been able to take it on hiking and kayaking trips too since it so light and easy to carry. After bringing it along on my kayaking trip, I definitely can confirm it’s waterproof too. Overall, really loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: I found the speaker to be a great product and of great value. The price for a waterproof, solar, and Bluetooth speaker is surprisingly low. It charges your phone, connects to Bluetooth and the speaker itself charges through solar panels. What more could you want! Not to mention the sound quality is fantastic. I can't wait to take it to the beach, camping or even the park. I am very pleased with my purchase. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: B Cab

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING find
customer_reviews.text: So I've been on the hunt for a bluetooth speaker for a while now. I kept searching & reading reviews and finally landed on the Original Solar Soundbar. I'm SO happy with my purchase! The design is awesome. It's sleek and very up to date. All the buttons are easy to read for those of us that are vision impared. The functionality of the speaker is super simple too. It connected with my iPhone instantly. But most importantly, the sound quality is AMAZING. I was wary of how the bass would sound and I'm so happy so that it doesn't degrade the quality of music/podcasts at all. All around the quality of this speaker is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to leave reviews for a lot of products, but this one quickly won me over. It sounded far better than my past waterproof Bluetooth portable speakers. Not to mention it is very easy to charge. There's no way to get confused. Just plug it in with the provided cables, which makes it even easier to transport with me when I do trips and days out. I brought it to the park with me and some friends and we had a blast! Though, I am lucky it is durable because my dog went at it. Oops! Anyways, I think this is a great product and will certainly be recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian VH

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good sound, portable
customer_reviews.text: Does not sound bad, not great. However, very easy to set up and use, and I leave it outside, seems weatherproof. Great for music in smaller areas, like around outdoor seating. Good for camping also, light and portable. Not quite enough power to quickly charge a phone, but enough to keep it from falling while using. Might charge better with more time and not using the phone
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: High quality speaker, fun and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the bomb! As a musician with experience in recording studios and professional speakers, I can definitely say with confidence that this speaker is high quality! I love the fact that it is usable in the outdoors and uses solar power to charge itself; I can do my homework outside in the sun, and not only that, but I can charge my phone with it too! I especially love the bass quality in this speaker, it is very clear and resonant. This product is super easy to use and transport, convenient and fun. I am so glad I purchased this product, it will go everywhere with me and my friends for many upcoming adventures! :D
customer_reviews.author: Dane Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, nice volume. Needs to include more informative instructions.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing! My husband has spent hundreds on different speakers for work. The one he had constantly died while he was at work so I decided to get him this one. The first day he used it he came home and couldn't stop talking about it! He even offered for me to keep his prized over priced speaker, cause he didnt want it anymore. So glad I bought this! Best speaker on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sounds a whole lot better than price suggests
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker that sounds way better than the price sugests. I’ve actually used it for my car stereo sometimes. It’s the best and easiest bluetooth matchup of any of my other bluetooth devices on my iPhone. It’s also nice, that you can charge your phone from it too, while the speaker charges itself.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anton

customer_reviews.title: wont' stay on
customer_reviews.text: Started out great but now when it turns on it turns off in a few minutes. everyone says is it fully charged? There's never been a full green light, I've left it on the charger overnight! in the sun for a dozen hours - something is definitely wrong with it?! Can't even return it now I guess? STUCK with a $40 paperweight? HELP
customer_reviews.author: K Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Bought another one for my son.
customer_reviews.text: The solar charging feature is great!. Usually, it gets all the power it needs from just sitting on the dash of my car or on my windowsill at home. The sound quality is very good too...not as bass-heavy as my car stereo, but the sound is more clear, and it's easier to understand song lyrics. And for a tiny speaker, the bass response is very good and nicely balanced. Setup was a snap. No trouble at all connecting with my phone and immediately playing music straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, loud, and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: This speaker seems basic in design, but holds its own against others that have cost twice the price. You can use it with your phone's Bluetooth, or connect to your computer as an audio speaker easily, and boy it gets loud! I originally got it for my gardening, but even my brother asks to borrow it daily for background music as he does his art. (I'll add a video too showing it off later.)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Product came within two days. The speaker is packed with instructions, charger, an aux cord and a strap for carrying. The speaker is ready to use as soon as you take it out of the box. The sound quality is amazing and can be heard throughout the house, when put on max volume. It works well when receiving and calling people on the phone. I used the speaker while at this pool, water splashed on it and it still works like when I first got it. While outside the solar panels came in handy to keep the speaker charged. Overall it's an amazing, useful, lightweight speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Deja Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!! The first one I got actually did not pair but when I reached out to the seller, they immediately said no need to return it and they would send me another ASAP, which they did. That one works perfectly and paired immediately. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KU Eye Center

customer_reviews.title: Great range & sound for wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: The speaker shipped quickly and it fulfills the quality of sound and range for an outdoor speaker. It's attractive enough to also use in the house.
customer_reviews.author: LjoB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $!!!
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this little speaker. It worked great the first time we used it. However the second time...... it wouldn’t play more than 10 minutes. The solar charger would not charge unit or phone. Now it won’t even charge up by plugging it in! It will connect to my phone then it says low battery, and dies!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Kohls

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it, but major flaw...
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. Speaker has great sound, solar charges well and serves as a decent battery backup. The issue I have is with the port “door”. It is so loose, it does not seal out water. Thinking it may have been a manuf defect, ordered a replacement. Same problem. Will be returning both for refund. (And can someone explain why the photo gets rotated when uploaded??)
customer_reviews.author: R. Buttiglieri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it a 4 is because the connection between my phone and speaker sometimes cuts in and out when the phone is only about 2 ft away. It doesn’t do it all the time. Just on occasion. But otherwise it’s perfect for riding around on my golf cart or when I’m working in the yard. Even when I ride my bike. I do recommend this product. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! The solar power panel is one of its best features. Sound quality is very crisp, also I love the built quality. Its perfect for outdoors and on the go. I plan on buying another one for a gift because I believe this will be a great gift and I highly recommend for anyone looking for an amazing speaker that is built for outdoor adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easy setup, and sunlight charging.
customer_reviews.text: Its size helps with bass and outdoor charging increases the time it runs between charges. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: billc in ms

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this soundbar... It just would not charge in the sun, it would not retain a charge from the wall. When it is plugged in, it works great, but that was not the selling point of this device. The solar panels charge it up to 20%, which I assume (at this point) is just to keep the blinking light going.
customer_reviews.author: MartialBeing

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: For the price this thing is great for outdoor close proximity listening and two room indoor listening. If you live in a sunny climate you never have to charge this thing! The solar charger works great. The durability is outstanding. This thing took a 16’ fall from an upstairs balcony onto concrete (while playing) and it didn’t miss a beat! Kept right on playing. The end caps snapped off. Popped em right back in and it’s like it never happened. Great little unit.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Really great solar speaker. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really a great speaker. The play time alone surpasses almost every other speaker out there. And yes the voice on here sounds A LOT alike JARVIS from iron man. Pretty awesome. A little rapey though. Hahaha. I love it so far. And the solar panel works great.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: You might get a non charging one.
customer_reviews.text: First I was excited about everything that this speaker has. I received it at 30% charged, I placed it outside for the direct sun to charge it for days, and also tried charging with the cable. This speaker NEVER got any new charge. At 20% level turns off automatically. I really haven't had much use. I sent this video I recorded to the seller and no response, nothing. Sad to leave this review, but no choice. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Slawomir Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Easily 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best portable speaker I’ve ever bought! Really the best speaker period. I loved the fact that the speaker was charged and ready to use right out of the box. It was very easy to hook the speaker up to my phones Bluetooth and begin listening to my music! My son especially took interest into the speaker. Whenever a song is on he carries it from room to room with him (but it can definitely be heard from a few rooms over). It’s the perfect outdoor speaker for this reason. The sound range is great. It’s super durable, compact, and user friendly! 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A solid sound bar!
customer_reviews.text: My audio on my TV has been going out lately, and I did not want to buy a full-size sound bar because I live in an apartment. This was a perfect fit for my needs! I can’t wait to try it out as an outside radio paired with my iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for the money! Really easy to use, the solar charging makes it super portable without wires and the sound quality is very good. I really have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: William - NJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker for outdoor mommy’s!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing. On the way to the park, I left it on my car dash to start the solar power for music in the park while my son played. I love that I never have to worry about charging it before an outing. The sound is clear and quality with super simple Bluetooth pairing. Perfect toy for mom on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this speaker. It was my best friend on work days and for house cleaning. Suddenly it stopped taking a charge. I’ve put it outside, I’ve plugged it in. I’ve plugged it in while sitting in the window in full sun. Nothing works. It will not charge. I have only used it about 10 months :( unfortunately I have to say it is not worth it unless you’re okay with getting less than a year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker very last minute for a sudden camping trip. What’s a trip without some music ? So I bought it and was intrigued by the fact that It was solar powered and it actually worked !! Great sound quality, and it rained a little but the speaker was not damaged. Actually loved this! Now i have a speaker for great camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine S.

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is amazing value for money!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this Solar Bluetooth Speaker for a friend, however when it arrived, being a techie had to try it out for myself. I love it. I listened to music on the deck with my morning coffee, while I was watering the garden and working out. The sound quality is great...every bit as good as more expensive speakers. I took it out of the box and it found my laptop immediately. I love it and now have to buy another for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best speakers I've purchased in a long time. Was easy to use right out of the box. The sound quality is amazing. Loud enough for my neighbors to hear and I live on 5+ acres. Love that its solar powered so I dont have to carry a cable around with me all the time and like that I can charge my phone from the speaker as well. It's all around awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating product
customer_reviews.text: I used this speaker one time... since then each time I turn it on & it pairs it turns itself off...it is fully charged...I have only had it since December 28th...terrible
customer_reviews.author: Joni K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work where I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to recharge through a bathroom window. Didn't work there. The sound was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Worth it so far. Strange prompt voice
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very well put together, but worth the price. The voice for the speaker is a Chinese person whose first language isn’t English. Odd choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pabst Blue Ribbon is Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Crackle
customer_reviews.text: Even with the device only a few inches or a few feet it crackles, skips, blanks out. Exchanged it for a rechargeable version.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: This speaker was EXACTLY what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The reason i LOVE this speaker is because it is perfect for all occasions! I am a very outdoorsy person, so I am constantly going on hikes, swimming in pools, working out, etc and this speaker is great for that! It is solar, it charges your phone, AND is waterproof! This speaker does not sound like some random cheap speaker, this is high quality and totally affordable. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good speaker that won’t break you bank account!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmyne Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When it does work the sound is pretty good, I have had it in the sun charging and will only get about 20% charge and will turn of in less than 2 minutes. Keeps saying power off even if it's under direct sun exposure for a good amnt of time. Not sure if I got a faulty one but it does not work. I have also tried plugging in to outlet and charging that way and it is the se story.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working about 5 uses in.... sounded good while it worked. It now turns itself off after about 15 seconds. Sucks. It’s been about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Churchy

customer_reviews.title: Beach Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I’ve become King of the beach with my Solar Soundbar. The sound is superb and I charge my phone while listening music. I have only hd to recharge it once through cord because the solar charger works so well. Lasts all day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine Amarant

customer_reviews.title: There are better speakers out there
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok speaker. The Sun doesn’t really charge it that great, the sound quality isn’t that great either. It stopped working altogether, I wouldn’t buy this speaker there are better ones out there
customer_reviews.author: Aarron cassell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is comparable or possibly better than my $300 speaker. Sound quality is amazing. Great size for house parties or just chilling alone. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I use the speaker when I’m using myApemen projector. It works very well and has good sound quality. The battery life is pretty good too. The battery lasts approximately three days.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it, horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! I purchased this speaker about a year ago... crapped out on me 6 months later. They kindly sent me a new one... which has now crapped out on me again. Don’t waste your money with this one. Crappy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The solar sound bar is not only easy to use, it has perfect sound quality. Crystal clear. Also convenient to charge, just stick it in the sunlight! The soundbar plays using bluetooth or by audio cable, and also has a USB port. If you're looking for a speaker that is loud with great sound quality and a great value, the solar soundbar is it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Beilstein

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and runs forever on one charge.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent speaker, and literally runs forever on one charge if sat in the sun with the solar bar charging it as you’re listening to it, I charged it up by the wall when I first received it and I have listen to it for over a week without recharging it at least 6 to 7 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Olson

customer_reviews.title: cover for plug will not stay closed, not waterproof, will not stay charged even in sun light.
customer_reviews.text: We love the product, sounds great and is just what we were looking for, if it would stay charged and was truly waterproof. The problem is the cover that is suppose to close does not stay closed, so it will not be waterproof and it will not stay charged sunlight. Only works for about 45mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker excellent for outdoor and have a good sounds. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing all around speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Can charge solar or plugging in. Comes with strap, universal plug,aux cable. Love the fact that you can use it to charge a device as well and that you can use it even if you dont have Bluetooth. Good amount of bass and very clear sound. Call quality is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Very versatile. Can't say enough good things. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Sound not great
customer_reviews.text: Meh ! The sound sounds very cheap. The volume isn’t loud at all but for 40.00 you can’t expect Bose quality. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone if they are fussy about the sound quality. But, it’s ok for a dorm or bedroom I guess. Wouldnt buy again and it took forever to get here.
customer_reviews.author: RoxAnne

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & well-balanced sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a high quality speaker at a very affordable price - there's no need to look any further! Very sleek and attractive design that's super easy to use! Bottom Line: This is one the BEST affordable Bluetooth Speakers on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Quinten Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is better than I could have imagined. I typically use music when working, getting ready in mornings and at my home gym. This sound bar not only is durable but water resistant! Absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great so far. Hasn’t ever ran out of juice
customer_reviews.text: This ways bought as a take along speaker as I move from one old price of equipment to another
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money. Worked twice, now it won’t play a song without cutting out at least 3 times. I live in Arizona, plenty of sun, so it’s fully charged too.
customer_reviews.author: ZCarGo

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off  and pissed off
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't charge green light keeps flashing just wondering if it's actually got a battery in it certainly got ripped off with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kevin m.

customer_reviews.title: Would not charge.
customer_reviews.text: Product defective. Would not charge. Had to return it. Wanted to try a replacement but it was suddenly no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: JRD60

customer_reviews.title: Wow... great sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, easy to use. Love that it stays charged all day at the beach. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought wouldn’t hold a charge. I sent it back, great customer service and received another one quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seal broke
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and the black rubber that covers the input holes does not seal therefore water can get into the usb and charging holes. This should seal better.
customer_reviews.author: kristal

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Battery wont charge after one day. Wouldnt charge my phone and says 20% and goesboff immediately. Worked fine for maybe an hour
customer_reviews.author: Lelan burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice!

customer_reviews.author: H Aki

customer_reviews.title: Original Solar Powered Bluetooth Sound Bar.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little speaker, it sounds alot better than the computer speakers I was using. I tested all of the functions and they all worked. The buttons are easy to push and are responsive. This is my very first bluetooth speaker. It sounds pretty good and gets some what loud, but, dont expect a "big stereo" sound. To me it has enough bass. I have not tried to see how waterproof it is, as I got this to watch videos/movies from my phone and I don't listen to music when I take showers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker with added features!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this speaker! When I first played it the bass could be felt through our countertop. We /may/ have had it turned up for a bit of 90’s hip hop...... I love the extra solar charge for longevity and ability to charge my phone off of it. Nothing worse than getting somewhere and either your phone or your speaker dies. I have used this at the pool and the golf course. Love that I don’t have to worry about splashes or rain and that if it happens to get dropped, it is sturdy. Would highly recommend. This is our permanent travel and pool side speaker!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

product_meta.title: The Original Solar Soundbar - Solar Bluetooth Speaker - 50+ Hours of Playtime - Wireless Outdoor Bluetooth Speaker - Waterproof Bluetooth Portable Speakers with Solar Powered Portable Charger
feature_bullets: Unbelievable Sound: It combines 3 speakers into 1 for 360° degrees of crystal clear, high definition audio. A high performance digital signal processor & enhanced bass radiator ensures pounding bass and zero distortion at any volume.
Unlimited Power & 50+ Hours of Playtime: It features a built-in solar panel and a whopping 5000 mAh capacity power bank to charge both the speaker and your other devices - all day long.

Outdoor-Proof: Enhanced durability & IPX6 protection safeguards against rain, dust, snow, spills, and drops - making it the perfect wireless outdoor speaker for camping, sports, beaches, pool, bbq, adventure, and travel.

Packed with Features: Uses extended range wireless bluetooth so you can play music from up to 50 feet away. There’s a built-in AUX port, micro SD card slot for preloading music, extra USB ports to charge your other devices, and a built-in microphone for taking calls via bluetooth.

Superior Performance: The Solar Soundbar is the original, high performance, solar speaker that’s engineered to outperform competing products that look identical. Includes an 18 month warranty - love the Solar Soundbar or we’ll buy it back from you, no questions asked!
